post.description:
Initiates an asynchronous job to auto straighten an image. \
To get status of this job, call [Status API](/api/#operation/acrstatus).

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:

To get status of this job, call [Status API](/api/#operation/acrstatus).

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

get.summary: Get the status of a job.

parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.

post.description:
Generates a PNG file in 4 channel RGBA format with the generated cutout mask \
 applied to the input image generate a PNG file in 4 channel RGBA format with the generated cutout \
 mask applied to the input image.
To get status of this job, call [Status API](/api/#operation/icstatus).

parameters.name: x-gw-ims-org-id
parameters.description: IMS organization ID. This needs to be sent only if it is desirable to receive the job status through Adobe I/O Events.
